Articles.Content:
Hi, everyone.

We are now in search of a talented Content Designer to join the KSP team. In this role, you would be in charge of modeling and texturing parts and buildings inside the game. If you have practical experience in this area, can suitably display your talent and have interest in working alongside a small, but committed team of people based all over the world, feel free to send a cover letter, resume and portfolio to [email protected].

Due to the volume of submissions, not everyone may be contacted back. We appreciate your interest and good luck!

Edited January 29, 2014 by aLeXmOrA
